frame.name: Becoming_attached
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Item</fen> comes to be attached to a <fen>Goal</fen>, with a <fen>Connector</fen> forming a bond between the <fen>Handle</fen> of the <fen>Item</fen> and the <fen>Goal</fen> (or some part of it). Alternatively, multiple <fen>Items</fen> may form a bond between each other.
<ex>According to plan, <fex name="Item">the front part of the hull</fex> <fex name="Manner">quietly</fex> <t>attached</t> <fex name="Goal">to the docking gear</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Items">The cells</fex> <t>bind</t> <fex name="Result">together</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Connector
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Connector</fen> identifies the instrument used to attach, usually in a <ment>with</ment>-PP.
<ex>The remoras <t>attach</t> to the whale <fex name="Connector">with their strong jaws</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Handle
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Handle</fen> identifies the point of attachment on the <fen>Goal</fen> to which the <fen>Item</fen> attaches.
<ex>The remoras <t>attach</t> <fex name="Handle">by the mouth</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Item
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Item</fen> identifies the entity that comes to be attached to the <fen>Goal</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Item">Remoras</fex> <t>attached</t> to the dolphins.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Items
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Items</fen> identifies the plural items that are tied together, resulting in their mutual attachment.
<ex><fex name="Items">The cells</fex> <t>bind</t> together.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Goal</fen> identifies the location to which the first <fen>Item</fen> is attached.
<ex>The remoras <t>attach</t> <fex name="Goal">to the underside of the whale</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Result</fen> of an attaching event.
<ex>The cells <t>bind</t> <fex name="Result">together</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which an <fen>Item</fen> comes to be attached to a <fen>Goal</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the attaching event takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time when the attaching event takes place.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: agglutinate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: firmly stick or be stuck together to form a mass

lexUnit.name: bind.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to attach oneself to something else

lexUnit.name: moor.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to become attached by cable or rope to the shore or to an anchor
